entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
